DocAttribute.Name: Depth
DocAttribute.Documentation: Profile depth, see illustration above (= h).

DocAttribute.Name: Width
DocAttribute.Documentation: Profile width, see illustration above (= b).

DocAttribute.Name: WallThickness
DocAttribute.Documentation: Constant wall thickness of profile (= ts).

DocAttribute.Name: Girth
DocAttribute.Documentation: Lengths of girth, see illustration above (= c).

DocAttribute.Name: InternalFilletRadius
DocAttribute.Documentation: Internal fillet radius according the above illustration (= r1). If it is not given, zero is assumed.

DocAttribute.Name: CentreOfGravityInX
DocAttribute.Documentation:
Location of centre of gravity along the x axis measured from the center of the bounding box.
IFC2x Edition 2 Addendum 2 CHANGE The attribute CentreOfGravityInX has been made optional. Upward compatibility for file based exchange is guaranteed.

DocWhereRule.Name: WR1
DocWhereRule.Documentation: The girth shall be smaller than half of the depth.

DocWhereRule.Name: WR2
DocWhereRule.Documentation: If the value for InternalFilletRadius is given, it shall be smaller than half of the Depth and half of the Width.

DocWhereRule.Name: WR3
DocWhereRule.Documentation: The WallThickness shall be smaller than half of the Width and half of the Depth.
